    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2773</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A trip I wont forget</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Reise, die ich nicht vergesse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un voyage que je n'oublierai pas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um desengate que eu não me esquecerei</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un viaggio che non mi dimenticherò</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα ταξίδι Ι συνηθισμένο ξεχνά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un viaje que no me olvidaré</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A lesson plan for a writing activity wherestudents write a short report for a magazine, based on personal experiences,includes assesment Rubric, and examples of student writing.l</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">language</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Lektionplan für eine Schreiben Aktivität 
wherestudents schreiben einen kurzen Report für eine Zeitschrift, 
basiert auf persönlichen Erfahrungen, schließen assesment Rubrik und
Beispiele des Kursteilnehmers writing.l ein</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un plan de leçon pour des wherestudents d'une 
activité d'écriture écrivent un état court pour un magasin, basé 
sur des expériences personnelles, incluent la rubrique d'assesment, 
et les exemples de l'étudiant writing.l</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma planta da lição para wherestudents de uma 
atividade da escrita escreve um relatório curto para um 
compartimento, baseado em experiências pessoais, inclui o rubric do 
assesment, e os exemplos do estudante writing.l</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un programma di lezione per i wherestudents di 
attività di scrittura scrive un rapporto corto per uno scomparto, 
basato sulle esperienze personali, include la rubrica di assesment e 
gli esempi dell'allievo writing.l</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα σχέδιο μαθήματος για μια δραστηριότητα γραψίματος
wherestudents γράφει μια σύντομη έκθεση για ένα περιοδικό, 
βασισμένο στην προσωπική εμπειρία, περιλαμβάνει τη ρουμπρίκα 
assesment, και τα παραδείγματα του σπουδαστή writing.l</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un plan de la lección para los wherestudents de 
una actividad de la escritura escribe un informe corto para un 
compartimiento, basado en experiencias personales, incluye la rúbrica
del assesment, y ejemplos del estudiante writing.l</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
